I can guide you about the university admission process in National Textile University
Offering support the best education facilities in campus.

patterns: Provide me list of all the departments
Which department is better according to you?
responses: There are more than 8 departments including engineering, computer science, fashion design, visual arts, BBA, social sciences etc.

patterns: Is NTS is valid to get admission?
Is there any entry exam to get admission?
responses: NTU is a merit based university, Its not easy to get admission here, you have to score well in entry exam, NTS is valid to get admission, social science don't need any entry test.

patterns: I want to know about university facitlites like hostel, cafeterica,sports club etc.
responses: NTU offers best facilities in the campus including hostel, cafeteria, sports club, you can join the socities to boost your confidence and to groom your personality.

patterns: I want to know about sports activities and socities
responses: NTU offers sports activities including sports week, leagues, society events and my others. NTU also have a gym. You can train there and keep yourself fit.

patterns: what kind of engineering they offer?
merit to get admission in engineering departments
responses: In NTU, textile engineering is the major type and it can has sub departments includes Garments,Spinning,Knitting,Weaving,Processing etc. This department is famous all over the country, you have to score well to get admission.

patterns: what kind of technology they offer?
merit to get admission in cs departments
responses: In NTU, computer science is the major type and it can has sub departments includes cs, Information Technology, Software Engineering,Artifical Intelligence etc. These department are famous if we talk about at city level, you have to score well to get admission.

In NTU, the fee structure is different for all departments, for engineering the total fee for 4 years is 5lakh RS,for Computer science 6lakh RS,for BBA 12lakh RS,for fashion design 12lakh RS. You can check the website for better understanding.For more information check this https://admissions.ntu.edu.pk/OAS/NTUW.aspx?App_MSqNo=null&CL=7OLGRrz3Fu6hHujRt/ZwMQ==
In NTU , the scholarships are only for the position holders, but the other NGO's and the government offers scholarships.

patterns: what do you say for this university?
responses: If you are a good student or you have patience then you should apply, but if you are a averge student then it will be a big mistake, There are many bright students in this university but they don't perform well due to pressure and lack of motivation. Best of luck!
